fields.description:
Failed to connect to remote thrift server.

Exceptions were thrown as below:

Could not open client transport with JDBC Uri: 
Error: Could not open client transport with JDBC Uri: jdbc:hive2://123.56.64.17:8400/logs: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset (state=08S01,code=0)
java.sql.SQLException: Could not open client transport with JDBC Uri: jdbc:hive2://123.56.64.17:8400/logs: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
        at org.apache.hive.jdbc.HiveConnection.openTransport(HiveConnection.java:208)
        at org.apache.hive.jdbc.HiveConnection.<init>(HiveConnection.java:154)
        at org.apache.hive.jdbc.HiveDriver.connect(HiveDriver.java:107)
        at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:664)
        at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:208)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.DatabaseConnection.connect(DatabaseConnection.java:148)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.DatabaseConnection.getConnection(DatabaseConnection.java:212)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.Commands.connect(Commands.java:1391)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.Commands.connect(Commands.java:1312)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.ReflectiveCommandHandler.execute(ReflectiveCommandHandler.java:52)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.execCommandWithPrefix(BeeLine.java:1093)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.dispatch(BeeLine.java:1132)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.execute(BeeLine.java:967)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.begin(BeeLine.java:879)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.mainWithInputRedirection(BeeLine.java:493)
        at org.apache.hive.beeline.BeeLine.main(BeeLine.java:476)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.RunJar.run(RunJar.java:221)
        at org.apache.hadoop.util.RunJar.main(RunJar.java:136)
Caused by: org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TIOStreamTransport.read(TIOStreamTransport.java:129)
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport.readAll(TTransport.java:86)
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslTransport.receiveSaslMessage(TSaslTransport.java:178)
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslTransport.open(TSaslTransport.java:307)
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TSaslClientTransport.open(TSaslClientTransport.java:37)
        at org.apache.hive.jdbc.HiveConnection.openTransport(HiveConnection.java:183)
        ... 25 more
Caused by: java.net.SocketException: Connection reset
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:209)
        at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:141)
        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.fill(BufferedInputStream.java:246)
        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read1(BufferedInputStream.java:286)
        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:345)
        at org.apache.thrift.transport.TIOStreamTransport.read(TIOStreamTransport.java:127)
        ... 30 more

No security is enabled. Hiveserver2 was started. Please advice.
And here is part of my hive-site.xml:

<property>
    <name>hive.server2.authentication</name>
    <value>NOSASL</value>
</property>
<property>
    <name>hive.server2.thrift.port</name>
    <value>8400</value>
    <description>Port number of HiveServer2 Thrift interface when hive.server2.transport.mode is 'binary'.</description>
  </property>
<property>
    <name>hive.server2.thrift.bind.host</name>
    <value>123.56.64.17</value>
    <description>Bind host on which to run the HiveServer2 Thrift service.</description>
  </property>


Do I miss anything?
fields.environment: CentOS6.8 x64, jdk1.8.0_91, apache hadoop 2.7.2, apache hive 2.0.1
